title: Surge in Bitcoin Lightning Network capacity may just be the tip of the iceberg
description:

title: Solana Dapps Blocked in the UK
description:

Two big Solana Dapps blocked UK users.  This happened because of “compliance concerns” over Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) regulations. It involved Marinade Finance and Orca Finance on Solana.
